modName: Quieter unsheathe draw Sword Bound Sword and Dagger
summary: Reduces the unsheathing sword/dagger sound to a bearable level
descriptionHtml:
[center][i]If you ever clenched your teeth or winced at the sound of your character (or a nearby NPC!) drawing their sword (headphones users know this pain), then this simple mod is for you.[/i]
[color=yellow][b]If you liked this please endorse! For easy endorsing visit your [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/history]Download history[/url]![/b][/color]

[img width=507,height=285]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/20841-1-1342815567.jpg[/img]ï»¿[/center]

I was looking for an unsheathing sound replacement, not because I don't like the vanilla sound, but because it's too damn loud! Unfortunately I didn't like any of the ones I found.
So this one is for the people who don't have any quarrel with the vanilla sound EXCEPT the fact that it's way too damn loud :) Simply reduced the amplitude of the sounds in Audacity.
Also reduced the dagger sound for stealthy characters who don't want all the dungeon hearing them when they unsheathe.

[size=4][color=yellow][b][u]MANUAL INSTALLATION:[/u][/b][/color][/size] Extract in Skyrim folder.
[size=4][color=yellow][b][u]NMM INSTALLATION:[/u][/b][/color][/size] Just click download! Easy peasy.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/113095]Original screenshot (1680x1050)[/url]

----------------------------------------------------------------

In a similar fashion, see [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1624]Quieter Ironflesh Stoneflesh Oakflesh Spells[/url] by larpster.

----------------------------------------------------------------

[color=yellow][b][u]My other works:[/u][/b][/color]
